channel.title: I have a client i need some help with
channel.description:
1- so... this client got 2 worlds ... and the second world only working is 317 i want to delete the first world , and make it works with the only second world
2-i want to edit or add npc/shops , and this client doesn't have autospawn thing... wut can i do ?
3-the donor points called as the old server name , can i change it ? 4-if i want the ingame players can only make new accounts if they got the same name account with the forums or website , what can i do ?
Thanks

item.title: I have a client i need some help with
item.dc:creator: @Wenis_Tree Wenis Tree
item.description:
@Wenis_Tree wrote:

is your server a 317 or just the second world?

Read full topic
